findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply() use loops to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list and evaluate total supply respectively, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Potential out-of-gas exception in includeInReward() function
findings.description: The function includeInReward() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Potential out-of-gas exception in _getCurrentSupply() function
findings.description: The function _getCurrentSupply() uses a loop to evaluate total supply and could be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long excluded addresses list.
